meanings.sent1: Last night, I redreamed about flying over the mountains.
meanings.sent2: After waking up, she redreamed the magical adventure she had just experienced.
meanings.sent3: The cat redreamed chasing a mouse, but this time, the mouse was riding a tiny skateboard.
meanings.sent4: Her mind redreamed the memories like a movie on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The child redreamed the story with a new ending where the dragon became friends with the knight.

meanings.definition: To have a new or different dream.
meanings.sent1: Every time he fell asleep, he redreamed a different scenario.
meanings.sent2: She often redreamed her childhood home in vivid detail.
meanings.sent3: The robot redreamed being a famous singer, hitting all the right notes.
meanings.sent4: His imagination redreamed the world into a place of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The artist redreamed reality into a colorful masterpiece on canvas.
